name: Cog Dominion
description: Masters of steam and steel. Their mechanized forces excel at sustained warfare.

name: Jade Dynasty
description: Ancient warriors channeling inner chi. Swift strikes and flowing combat.

name: Republic of Virel
description: Disciplined legions using coordinated tactics and strategic positioning.

name: Verdant Covenant
description: Nature's guardians commanding beasts and regenerative magic.

name: Eternal Frost Clan
description: Northern warriors drawing power from the cold embrace of death.

name: Bloodfang Warborn
description: Savage berserkers who grow stronger as battle rages on.
